turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Benkovce.
turn.2: Benkovce  Benkovce is a village and municipality in Vranov nad Topľou District in the Prešov Region of eastern Slovakia.
turn.4: In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1363.
turn.5: What can you tell me about it?
turn.6: The municipality lies at an altitude of 138 metres and covers an area of 8.239 km².
turn.8: According to the 2011 census, the municipality had 532 inhabitants.
turn.10: 515 of inhabitants were Slovaks and 17 others and unspecified.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: The records for genealogical research are available at the state archive "Statny Archiv in Presov, Slovakia"
